title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 350-3.1 - Designated food scraps generators list
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 350-3.1 - Designated food scraps generators list

State Regulations

The department will maintain a list of all designated
food scraps generators and make an updated list available on or before June 1
of each year, beginning in 2021. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
350-3.1

Adopted

New

York State Register August 11, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 32, eff. 1/1/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
